name: Friday Night Fighting
description:
Controlls: Move     W A S D     Punch   U I

I Really wish that i could flesh this game out a lot more, but still not bad for my first game.

All of the asset exept from the music and the hit and falling sound. The hit and falling sounds were made by 2 of my friends and the music creator is in the credits part.

Credits : The music in this game was made by BGM by Cristian Truţă - CT86.Bandcamp.com
